WarQuestClient documentation

v1.4

Welcome to the WarQuestClient documentation.

Introduction

WarQuest client is Windows tool to easy access the internet WarQuest game.

Links

Website: http://www.plaatsoft.nl Code: http://code.google.com/p/warquestclient

Credits

Documentation: wplaat

ReleaseNotes

20-02-2012 Version 1.4

  • Added local welcome screen.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.4.1.
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

01-12-2011 Version 1.3

  • Added https support so donate page can be loaded correctly.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.3.0.
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

25-11-2011 Version 1.2

  • Added support to visit other urls.
  • Added support for file transfer.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.3.0.
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

20-11-2011 Version 1.1

  • Maintenance release
  • Use QT library 4.7.4 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.3.0.
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

10-10-2011 Version 1.0

  • Added internet and new version check.
  • Increase performance.
  • BugFix: If internet connection failed during auto sign-on. Invalid account was created. Resolved!
  • Use QT library 4.7.4 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.3.0
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

07-09-2011 Version 0.70

  • Added load progress indication in title bar.
  • Added reload button to popup menu.
  • Added icons to popup menu.
  • Added QT version information on about window.
  • Use QT library 4.7.4 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.3.0
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

24-06-2011 Version 0.60

  • Canvas window height depends now on real video screen size.
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

22-05-2011 Version 0.50

  • Rename proxy window to settings window.
  • Added username and password settings.
  • Added client version information in first request.
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

13-04-2011 Version 0.40

  • Added direct sign on (No manual registation and/or login needed anymore)
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

24-03-2011 Version 0.30

  • Update URL to www.warquest.nl
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
  • Release app on freewarefiles.com.

09-03-2011 Version 0.20

  • Added about page.
  • Added proxy page.
  • Refactor source code.
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
  • First official release on freewarefiles.com.

08-03-2011 Version 0.10

  • Start building.
  • Added application icon.
  • First release for the world.
  • Use QT library 4.7.2 as engine.
  • WarQuest is build with QtCreator v2.0.1
